bill.title: RESOLVED, that the Senate is ready to meet with the House of Representatives in Joint Convention for the purpose of hearing the Budget Address by his Excellency, Governor Chris Sununu.

history.action: Introduced and Adopted, Voice Vote; 02/14/2023; Senate Journal 7
